Name: Rotatex 2
About the game: Rotatex 2 is an independent story with new adventures. You have to rotate the level and solve puzzles. Feature of game: Adventure with the rotation of the level Convenient control Challenging levels Physics, doors, keys and traps. In the game you have to smoothly rotate the level and jump over obstacles. A cat named Rotatex is able to cling to walls and use sharp spikes.
